title: Online Learning of Deep Hybrid Architectures for Semi-supervised Categorization
authors: AG Ororbia II, D Reitter, J Wu, CL Giles - Machine Learning and  …
excerpt: Abstract A hybrid architecture is presented capable of online learning from both labeled and unlabeled samples. It combines both generative and discriminative objectives to derive a new variant of the Deep Belief Network, ie, the Stacked Boltzmann Experts Network model ...
